inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

inapplicable.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

inapplicable.help: Table header text should not be empty

inapplicable.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.help: Frames must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures <marquee> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
inapplicable.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures <object> elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

inapplicable.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target

inapplicable.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

inapplicable.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > main:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(9)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(11) > div > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > main:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(14)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(15) > div > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > nav:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)

violations.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation

any.message: Element does not have an alt attribute
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element has no title attribute
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensures every form element has a label

any.message: Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
Form element does not have an explicit <label>
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element has no title attribute
Element has no placeholder attribute
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

  Form element does not have an explicit <label>

  Element has no title attribute
  Element has no placeholder attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
violations.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

any.message: The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
violations.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

any.message: The main landmark is contained in another landmark.

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The main landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
violations.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

any.message: Document has more than one main landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has more than one main landmark

violations.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

any.message: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

all.message: Page must have a level-one heading
